info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:10PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Transylvania, northwestern Greenville and northwestern Pickens Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 209 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Brevard, or near Rosman, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brevard, Rosman, Jocassee Gorges, Keowee Toxaway State Park, Table Rock State Park, Gorges State Park, Lake Jocassee, Lake Keowee, Pumpkintown and Balsam Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
